Uses of Package
org.forgerock.openam.rest.authz

  • Packages that use org.forgerock.openam.rest.authz 
    Package Description
    org.forgerock.openam.core.rest.cts  
    org.forgerock.openam.core.rest.session
    Session-resource specific classes.
    org.forgerock.openam.core.rest.sms  
    org.forgerock.openam.rest.authz
    This package contains the authorization filters for end points.
    org.forgerock.openam.selfservice
    Package contains CREST services for handling user self service functions such as password reset and user registration.
    org.forgerock.openam.uma.rest  
  • Classes in org.forgerock.openam.rest.authz used by org.forgerock.openam.core.rest.cts 
    Class Description
    AdminOnlyAuthzModule
    Filter which ensures that only users with an SSO Token which has Administrator-level access are allowed access to the resources protected.
    SSOTokenAuthzModule  
  • Classes in org.forgerock.openam.rest.authz used by org.forgerock.openam.core.rest.session 
    Class Description
    AdminOnlyAuthzModule
    Filter which ensures that only users with an SSO Token which has Administrator-level access are allowed access to the resources protected.
    CrestPrivilegeAuthzModule
    A CREST authorization module for performing privilege checking, {@see PrivilegeAuthzModule} for more detail.
  • Classes in org.forgerock.openam.rest.authz used by org.forgerock.openam.core.rest.sms 
    Class Description
    CrestPrivilegeAuthzModule
    A CREST authorization module for performing privilege checking, {@see PrivilegeAuthzModule} for more detail.
  • Classes in org.forgerock.openam.rest.authz used by org.forgerock.openam.rest.authz 
    Class Description
    AdminOnlyAuthzModule
    Filter which ensures that only users with an SSO Token which has Administrator-level access are allowed access to the resources protected.
    AgentOnlyAuthzModule
    Authorization module that only grants access to agents (e.g. web agent, J2EE agent, SOAP STS).
    AnyPrivilegeAuthzModule
    An authorization module that permits a privileged user from any realm to get access to the requested realm.
    CrestPrivilegeAuthzModule
    A CREST authorization module for performing privilege checking, {@see PrivilegeAuthzModule} for more detail.
    SpecialAndAdminUserOnlyAuthzModule
    This AuthzModule checks for the presence of the user corresponding to the token returned from AccessController.doPrivileged(AdminTokenAction.getInstance()), or other special user, as evaluated by AuthD#isSpecialUser.
    SSOTokenAuthzModule
